name: Gray World - Demo
description:
This is a gray and artificial world, a feelingless one, where countless of gray creatures live, there is no sadness in the world, neither exist happiness, nothing changes in their lives, days, weeks, doesnt matter; they wake up, walk, "live" their lives with no change at all, they are all the same, nothing is different.

But a day, our protagonist feels a drop of color, a feeling of curiosity takes him through the place, giving him the ability to notice a bright door, completely different to anything he had seen in his life. Not understanding his actions, or not even why he was doing it, he entered the door...

"Oh, finally someone arrives?" is what he hears, echoing the room inside.
